results.idea: Earnings momentum (quarterly EPS acceleration)
results.description: Uses EPS momentum to capture stocks with accelerating earnings. Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining time-series momentum and cross-sectional ranking. SUGGESTION2: no vector fields detected so not applied. SUGGESTION3: coverage=0.5 so ts_backfill applied to EPS. SUGGESTION4: EPS has high userCount/alphaCount so used. Kept implementation short (<=7 operators, 1 datafield) per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence set to 0.65 because EPS momentum is historically predictive but noisy.

results.idea: Accruals quality (earnings vs cashflow)
results.description: High accruals often predict mean reversion. SUGGESTION1: used income and operating cashflow to compute accruals. SUGGESTION2: no vector fields. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill on all three low-coverage fields. SUGGESTION4: income and cashflow_op have high userCount so signal robust. Implementation respects operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Value via EV/Sales (cheap relative to sales)
results.description: Cheap EV/Sales often outperforms. SUGGESTION1: combined enterprise_value and sales. SUGGESTION2: no vector. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied to both fields. SUGGESTION4: enterprise_value and sales have high userCount. Kept implementation compact. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Return on invested capital (ROIC) re-ranking trend
results.description: Capture improving capital efficiency: change in invested_capital-adjusted return_equity proxy. SUGGESTION1: used return_equity and invested_capital. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both fields. SUGGESTION4: invested_capital has high counts. Kept <=2 fields and operators. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Free cash flow strength (cashflow vs capex)
results.description: High operating cashflow minus capex signals quality. SUGGESTION1: combined cashflow_op and capex. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both fields. SUGGESTION4: cashflow_op and capex have high userCounts. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Leverage reduction (declining long-term debt)
results.description: Firms reducing long-term debt may outperform. SUGGESTION1: used debt_lt and equity to scale. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both fields. SUGGESTION4: debt_lt and equity have high counts. Implementation small. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Operating margin expansion (operating_income / sales improvement)
results.description: Capture firms with improving operating profitability. SUGGESTION1: used operating_income and sales. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both fields. SUGGESTION4: operating_income and sales have high userCounts. Confident moderate at 0.62.

results.idea: Inventory efficiency (inventory_turnover vs peers)
results.description: Rising inventory_turnover signals operational improvement. SUGGESTION1: single field inventory_turnover. SUGGESTION2: not vector. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: field has high userCount. Implementation short. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Short-term liquidity improvement (current_ratio increase)
results.description: Improvements in current_ratio suggest balance sheet strengthening. SUGGESTION1: used current_ratio. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: current_ratio has high userCount. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Buyback intensity (recent repurchases)

results.idea: Low stock compensation expense (quality)

SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both fields. SUGGESTION4: stock comp moderate userCount but acceptable. Kept concise. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Rising operating income relative to market cap (efficiency vs market)
results.description: Operating_income / mkvalt rising suggests earnings re-rating potential. SUGGESTION1: used operating_income and fnd6_mkvalt. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: mkvalt moderate userCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Low extraordinary items (exclude one-offs)
results.description: Low extraordinary items (fnd6_xidos) indicates cleaner earnings. SUGGESTION1: used fnd6_xidos. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: low userCount -> cautious. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Improving operating income per employee trend (momentum)
results.description: Similar to per-employee metric but using ts_zscore momentum. SUGGESTION1: used operating_income and employees. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: moderate userCounts. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Rising sales per common share (sales growth per share)
results.description: Per-share sales growth supports per-share earnings. SUGGESTION1: used sales and shares outstanding. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: sales high userCount. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Improving operating cashflow vs long-term liabilities
results.description: Rising cashflow relative to long-term liabilities signals deleveraging capacity. SUGGESTION1: used cashflow_op and dltt (fnd6_cptnewqv1300_dlttq). SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: dltt moderate userCount. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Low seasonal sales volatility (inverse ts_std_dev of sales growth)
results.description: Stable sales growth reduces downside. SUGGESTION1: used sales. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: sales high userCount. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Rising operating income share of total assets (ROA trend)
results.description: Rising operating_income / assets indicates ROA improvement. SUGGESTION1: used operating_income and assets. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: both high userCounts. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Declining nonoperating income reliance (nonoperating vs total income fall)
results.description: Firms less reliant on nonoperating income preferred. SUGGESTION1: used fnd6_newa2v1300_nopi and income. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: nopi moderate userCount. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Improving working capital to sales (wcap / sales decline)
results.description: Lower wcap per sales indicates efficiency. SUGGESTION1: used fnd6_newqv1300_wcapq and sales. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: sales strong userCount. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High operating_income relative to liabilities (solvency-adjusted profitability)
results.description: Operating returns relative to liabilities indicates solvency strength. SUGGESTION1: used operating_income and liabilities. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: liabilities high userCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Improving payable days (declining payables / cogs)
results.description: Shorter payable days may indicate stronger supplier terms but also cash use; treat with caution. SUGGESTION1: used fnd6_cptnewqeventv110_apq and fnd6_cogss. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: cogs moderate userCount. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Stable share count with rising income (anti-dilution signal)
results.description: Rising income without dilution is positive. SUGGESTION1: used income and shares outstanding. SUGGESTION2: none. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: income high userCount. Confidence 0.59.
